Label;Caption=FORMAT CONTROL WIZARD X=2 Y=2 Height=2 Width=152 ForeColor=0 Justification=2 FontIncrease=3

field.output: Step 2: Setting Calculations for fields with assigned values
field.property: Label;Caption=Step 2: Setting Calculations for fields with assigned values X=14 Height=2 Width=136 ForeColor=0

field.output: To go to Step 2, press OK. On the following screen, enter the default value for each field and press Proceed. The FC Wizard will update Format Control Calculations to assign each field to its specified value. The calculations will execute on add, update and delete. The updated Format Control record will be displayed upon completion.
field.property: Wlabel;Caption=To go to Step 2, press OK. On the following screen, enter the default value for each field and press Proceed. The FC Wizard will update Format Control Calculations to assign each field to its specified value. The calculations will execute on add, update and delete. The updated Format Control record will be displayed upon completion. X=20 Y=12 Height=8 Width=120 ForeColor=0 ArrayLength=4

field.output: To skip Step 2 and save any previous Format Control changes, press Skip.
field.property: Label;Caption=To skip Step 2 and save any previous Format Control changes, press Skip. X=14 Y=22 Height=2 Width=136 ForeColor=0

field.output: Otherwise, press Cancel to close out of FC Wizard and cancel all Format Control Changes.
field.property: Label;Caption=Otherwise, press Cancel to close out of FC Wizard and cancel all Format Control Changes. X=14 Y=26 Height=2 Width=136 ForeColor=0
